posts.post_title: 1895 N300 Mayo Cut Plug  Amos Russie   SGC 40
posts.post_content: I am selling  1895 Mayo Cut Plug   N300 Amos Russie (mispelled) SGC40---I will take offers starting at $2400-----Legendary Auctions just sold a PSA 3(mc) for $4481---Mine looks better and is not miscut--check both scans---This is a tough card---any questions, you can email me----thanks, Don
